entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:16 p.m. MST Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 8:00 PM MST Thursday 13 April 2023
Temperature: -17.5°C

Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -33

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h except gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h except gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h except gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains late in the evening and overnight. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 13 April 2023
